name: gamess-ri-mp2-miniapp

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The GAMESS RI-MP2 mini-app computes the correlation energy with the
Hartree-Fock energy and wave-function given as inputs. The inputs were
generated from GAMESS.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
The Cray Scientific Libraries package, LibSci, is a collection of
numerical routines optimized for best performance on Cray systems.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Cray/HPE packaging of MVAPICH2 for HPE Apollo systems
